original_text: But the Holy Spirit helped Stephen to be very wise when he spoke. So these men could not say that he was wrong.
korean_text: 스데반이 지혜와 성령으로 말함을 그들이 능히 당하지 못하여

sentences.original_text: But the Holy Spirit helped Stephen
to be very wise when he spoke
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 말할 때 매우 지혜롭게 되게 하셨습니다

sentences.original_text: So these men could not say
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 이 사람들은 말할 수 없었습니다
